pages.text: Runic Pendants are powerful pieces of equipment that can be used for a permanent buff.
Above is the crafting recipe to acquire a Runic Angel Ring. This is the most powerful of all runic jewelries as it allows you to gain the ability to fly.
Above is the crafting recipe to acquire a Runic Healing Ring, which can give you regeneration.
Above is the crafting recipe to acquire a Runic Speed Ring, which can give you swiftness.
Above is the crafting recipe to acquire a Runic Strength Ring, which can give you strength.
Above is the crafting recipe to acquire a Runic Wisdom Ring, which can give you better deals.
